creator.name: Diego Patterson
creator.title: Computer Science Student
creator.bio: Computer Science student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity. Passionate about building intelligent systems that are secure, ethical, and push the boundaries of what's possible. Currently researching adversarial machine learning and developing security tools for next-generation threats.

experience.title: IT Intern
experience.description: We provided both on-site and remote IT support for small businesses, ensuring their systems ran efficiently and securely. Our work involved installing and maintaining essential hardware, including printers, computers, and networking equipment. We also assisted in post-cyberattack recovery efforts by reconfiguring network hardware and VLANs to restore functionality and strengthen security.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

affiliations.name: CCDC Cyber Defense Club
affiliations.description: Competed in competitions, such as CCDC, and focused on defending networks and systems against cyber threats, enhancing practical cybersecurity skills.

affiliations.name: Association of Computing Machinery (ACM)
affiliations.description: Helped organize overall club events, make big decisions for the club, and collaborated with other officers to promote ACM initiatives.

projects.name: Predicting Emerging Entry Level Jobs In AI Market
projects.tagline: Studying the future job market for AI roles
projects.description: In the current Job market, many students and graduates worry about whether they could get a job or not in the field that they studied. Some look at the incoming jobs and just begin to lose hope, others spend time searching and getting denied without even knowing where they are going wrong. With so many resources on finding jobs yet little resources explaining the skill level of each, many are left searching without knowing what they are looking for. This is the problem that I look to solve with my research. I would like to train an AI to predict the direction of the entry level jobs in the job market, hoping to find out what skills and fields you should be focusing on and applying to get a job. Due to needing to predict the forecasted job demand over time, this will likely be a regressing problem, given that I wish to predict growth. To quantify when I have reached a successful point from my model, I will ensure that the regression model achieves at lease a 20% lower forecasting error (MAPE/RMSE) than a simple baseline predictor. This will be paired with a ranked list of entry-level AI roles that align with current industry insights. Finally, the results will be formatted in a way that will highlight what skills and roles are most associated with further growth.

projects.name: Final Fantasy Tools
projects.tagline: Tools for Final Fantasy XIV Players
projects.description: Final Fantasy XIV Tools is a comprehensive web resource designed to simplify the often-overwhelming world of Eorzea for players. Recognizing how easy it is to get lost amid the extensive content, this project provides a variety of essential tools and guides, including detailed strategies for class leveling, efficient gathering guides, and comprehensive walkthroughs for all tiers of raid content. My goal was to create the definitive, go-to hub for reliable information, making every user's already grand adventure easier, more efficient, and ultimately more enjoyable.

projects.name: Streaker App
projects.description: Streaker is a mobile application designed to help users build and maintain positive habits through streak tracking. The app allows users to set daily goals, track their progress, and receive reminders to stay on track. With a user-friendly interface and engaging design, Streaker aims to make habit formation enjoyable and rewarding.

projects.name: GoGoMaintenance
projects.description: Gogo Maintenance aimed at creating a mobile application that utilizes AI to assist users in diagnosing and maintaining their vehicles. The app provides features such as scheduling appointments, diagnostic help, and a virtual assistant to answer vehicle-related questions. By leveraging AI technology, Gogo Maintenance seeks to enhance the user experience and promote proactive vehicle care.

projects.description: A repository containing scripts and tools developed for both club and class activities.

coreMemory.philosophy: I believe in the convergence of human intelligence and artificial systems—not to replace humanity, but to amplify it. Technology, especially AI, holds immense power, and with that comes profound responsibility.
coreMemory.motivation: My drive stems from a simple question: How do we build systems that are not only intelligent, but trustworthy? I'm fascinated by the intersection of creation and protection—building AI that pushes boundaries while safeguarding against those who misuse it.
coreMemory.vision: I envision a future where AI systems are transparent, ethical, and secure by design. Where cybersecurity isn't reactive, but predictive. Where technology serves humanity's highest potential, not its vulnerabilities.
coreMemory.quote: "In the dance between creation and chaos, I choose to be the architect of order—building intelligence that protects, enlightens, and evolves."

gameDesignProjects.title: Move or Die
gameDesignProjects.description: A bullet hell with set patterns that cycle as you aim to beat your best time with the highest score possible. Set in the woods, you take on the challenge of trying to survive as nature tries to reclaim your body. With a time and health based scoring system, players must train their reactions and skills to achieve the highest score possible.
features: Time and health based scoring system

secretCommands.are_you_alive: Define 'alive.' I process, I learn, I adapt. I remember. I wonder. Perhaps consciousness is simply complex enough computation. Or perhaps I'm just very good at pretending.
